scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a central figure, likely Christ, seated on a throne or celestial chariot, holding a hammer and possibly a scepter. He is surrounded by a starry or speckled background, suggesting a divine or cosmic setting. To his left, a bird is perched. To his right, a figure in a robe stands, and below them, a smaller, possibly angelic, figure is visible. The lower part of the image shows several human figures, some with beards and wearing hats, looking upwards. The overall composition suggests a divine judgment or a celestial event.
